name: Vehicle turning
text: §291C-62  Vehicle turning.  The driver of a vehicle intending to turn within an intersection or into an alley, private road, or driveway shall yield the right-of-way to any vehicle, bicycle, or person approaching from the opposite direction or proceeding in the same direction when such vehicle, bicycle, or person is within the intersection or so close thereto as to constitute an immediate hazard. [L 1971, c 150, pt of §1; am L 1977, c 180, §2]
